org.uutuc.util
Class SingleFileXReader

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.uima.resource.Resource_ImplBase
      org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource_ImplBase
          org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase
              org.uutuc.util.SingleFileXReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
BaseCollectionReader, CollectionReader, ConfigurableResource, Resource
public class SingleFileXReader
extends CollectionReader_ImplBase


This collection reader allows one to read in a single XMI or XCAS file. It's primary purpose is to help out a couple JCasFactory create methods. However, it is also used for this project unit tests as an example collection reader.

Author:
Steven Bethard, Philip Ogren

Field Detail

PARAM_FILE_NAME

public static final java.lang.String PARAM_FILE_NAME
"FileName" is a single, required, string parameter that takes either the name of a single file or the root directory containing all the files to be processed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PARAM_XML_SCHEME

public static final java.lang.String PARAM_XML_SCHEME
"XMLScheme" is a single, optional, string parameter that specifies the UIMA XML serialization scheme that should be used. Valid values for this parameter are "XMI" (default) and "XCAS".

See Also:
XmiCasSerializer, XCASSerializer, Constant Field Values
